text.title: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap

head.s: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap

p.s: If you 've ever seen one of the " Dance Moms " performances , you 'll already know that they dance to certain music that fits the performance .
Do any search on YouTube for " Dance Moms Audio Swap " , and you 'll come across a collection of videos of performances that have been changed and cut .
In just the same way , you can create a Dance Moms Audio Swap .
And although less frequently done , you can also use audio swapping in other ways than Dance Moms Audio Swaps .

item.s: Get the device(s) needed .
This is a mobile method , so you will need an Apple device ( or some device with iMovie on it ) .
This includes : Mac ( computers/laptops ) , iPhone , iPod and iPad .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 1.jpg

item.s: Get the apps needed .
The apps you will need are :

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 2.jpg

item.s: iMovie ( this may be free in some cases )
Video download and player - Titan ( sometimes just called " Free Video " ) ( free or premium ) .
Open " Video Download " .
At the bottom should be a " Browser " tab .
Tap that .
Scroll up .
There is a URL bar and a Google Search bar .
In Google , search for a Dance Moms number you 'd like to use .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 3.jpg

item.s: Tap the video .
Scroll up and tap and hold the URL of the video .
A list menu should come up .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 4.jpg

item.s: Tap " Download As " and tap the name bar to type .
You can also just download the video without renaming it .
You 'll be able to see the video by the thumbnail , so it does n't really matter what you name it .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 5.jpg

item.s: After downloading the video(s) , go to " Videos " at the bottom of the application .
Your videos will come up .
Tap and hold the video you want to audio swap .
Tap " Save to camera roll " .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 6.jpg

item.s: It can be easy to forget or maybe think you can skip this step , but it is essential , so do n't overlook it .
Open iMovie .
Tap the create button ( " + " ) .
Tap " Movie " .
On the design " Simple " , tap " Create " .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 7.jpg

item.s: Tap the media icon in the top left of your work area .
You should be on " Video " in the tabs at the bottom of the app .
Tap " all " and choose the video that you downloaded .
Tap an arrow that signifies " use " .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 8.jpg

item.s: Tap the tab " Audio " at the bottom .
Choose your song .
Choose the " use " arrow .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 9.jpg

item.s: In your iMovie studio , tap the video .
Choose the sound icon .
Turn the sound to 0 % .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 10.jpg

item.s:
Remove all parts of the video that are
not
dancing ( the audience , judges , etc. ) .
You can do this by :

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 11.jpg

item.s: Putting the white work bar line where you are splitting the dance and part that should be taken out .
This should be done twice unless the part that is being taken out is at the beginning or end .
Tapping the part to be removed and tapping " Delete " .
Choose parts of the dance to move around if you want to change the dance .
This works the same as parts to be removed ( Step 9 ) .
Separate parts of the dance .
Duplicate them .
Hold them in to move them to a different part of the dance .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 12.jpg

item.s: Note :
When you are moving a part , it can only be placed at separations or at the beginning or end .
If there is a part of the dance that you would like to remove , but the clip is too short , shorten the part attached to it .
Fix your song , if it needs to be amended .
For example , split it , duplicate it , shorten it , and so on .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 13.jpg

item.s: Tap the back arrow at the top left of your screen .
Your work should already be saved .
Name your work .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 14.jpg

item.s: Publish your work .
This step is optional .

figure.rend: Create a Dance Moms Audio Swap Step 15.jpg

item.s: To play the full song ( it gets cut off when the video is too short ) , duplicate the video to be longer .
Once the song reaches its end , or where you would prefer it to stop , you can remove duplications of the video while keeping the song long .
People may not like your work .
If they do n't , just politely tell them that you wanted to create an audio swap , and if they do n't want to watch it , they do n't have to .
Say it politely though !
Your work will never be completely perfect – – remember , that does n't make it a bad audio swap .
You will get better .
A first audio swap may not be as good as others – – yet .
